ygData.subject: Re: Monk Headband Items
ygData.msgSnippet: In Befallen, 3rd level, past the false wall, in the alcove to the left: The Thaumologist(? Can t remember since we killed her so fast... ) drops Marnek s
ygData.messageBody:
In Befallen, 3rd level, past the false wall, in the alcove to the left:

The Thaumologist(? Can't remember since we killed her so fast...<EG>) drops Marnek's Dagger.

Priest Amiaz drops the Blackened Wand(Marnek's Wand?). He spawns in the same place as the Thaumologist.

I was there a couple of weeks ago and the place was deserted (Karana server).

I think the Priest Zaharn in Permafrost drops the coronet. I hear he is around level 30.



---------- Original Message ----------------------------------
From: FizbanJ@...
Reply-to: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Date: Wed, 1 Sep 1999 19:23:48 EDT

>From: FizbanJ@...
>
>I was wondering if anyone knows what mobs drop the following items, and
>whereabouts in the zone they are.
>
>Blackened Wand (or staff, not sure) - from befallen
>Dagger of Marnek - from befallen
>Zaharns coronet - from permafrost
>
>Thanks, any help would be appreciated
>
>~FizbanJ~
>18 Monk - Solusek Ro
